description: Details of materials pursuant to condition 3 of planning permission Ref PP/2014/2894 dated 06/10/14 for redevelopment of 67-75 The Broadway, West Ealing for a 70 bedroom hotel development (Use Class C1) and A1 (Retail) and A2 (Professional Services) at ground-floor level. The proposal consists of the construction of a part 5/part 6-storey development to create a 70-bedroom Hotel (C1 use class) on the site of the demolished two-storey building at 73-73 The Broadway, including the use of part of the ground-floor as an A2 use (Betting Shop) fronting onto Uxbridge Road and the relocation of the A1 - Butchers Shop to the rear part of the site, with a main retail frontage on to Melbourne Avenue. The proposal also involves the construction of an additional two-storey structure above 67-73 The Broadway (three-storeys in total) to be used as hotel accommodation; the continued use of the ground-floor units as A1 retail shops, associated servicing and deliveries
